org.anyframe.util.system
Class ZipUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.util.system.SystemUtilBase
      org.anyframe.util.system.ZipUtil

public abstract class ZipUtil
extends SystemUtilBase

Class that provides file or directory compress/decompress function. Supports compress/decompress of zip, tar, tar.gz, etc. files using Apache Commons Compress function. Zip file can additionally define Encoding, and original Encoding should be taken into consideration when decompressing file that includes Korean file name.

Below is an example of directory compress or decompress.

Refer to the below results when testing in Windows XP Korean version 

        compressZip - encoding : null or UTF-8 --> decompressZip(encoding : null, EUC-KR, UTF-8 all can be used), decompressJavaZip can be used, decompressArchive can be used
        compressZip - encoding : EUC-KR         --> decompressZip(encoding : should be EUC-KR), decompressJavaZip error occurs, decompressArchive error occurs

Author:
ByungHun Woo

protected static boolean processDecompress(ZipUtil.DecompressCallBack action,
                                           java.lang.String targetZipFileStr,
                                           java.lang.String destDirStr)
decompress general template - compress file check and destDir check, within decompress main logic Includes DecompressCallBack individual logic call handling.

Parameters:
action - DecompressCallBack
targetZipFileStr - target zip file
destDirStr - destination directory
Returns:
true if decompress process is successful, false if not

processEachContent

protected static void processEachContent(java.io.File destDir,
                                         java.io.InputStream ais,
                                         boolean isDirectory,
                                         java.lang.String entryName)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Provides individual Entry handling that can be commonly used in various compress cases. Content of individual Entry in compressed file is extracted in Stream format and created as file in destination path. In this case, there is no content when Entry is directory, so the related directory is created.

Parameters:
destDir - destination directory
ais - input stream
isDirectory - true if entry is directory, false if not
entryName - the name of entry
Throws:
java.io.IOException

compressZip

public static boolean compressZip(java.lang.String targetDir,
                                  java.lang.String destArchiveStr)
Handle Zip compress by getting compress destination path for directory or file as parameter. In this case, create compressed file in destArchiveStr path returned as parameter.

Parameters:
targetDir - target directory
destArchiveStr - absolute path of compressed file to be created (or standard relative path of working directory)
Returns:
true if compress process is successful, false if not

compressZip

public static boolean compressZip(java.lang.String targetDir,
                                  java.lang.String destArchiveStr,
                                  java.lang.String encoding)
Get compress destination path for directory or file and handle Zip. In this case, compressed file is created in destArchiveStr path returned as parameter, and Entry filename is developed in compressed file applying Encoding returned as parameter.

Parameters:
targetDir - target directory
destArchiveStr - destination archive
encoding - platform default when null
Returns:
true if compress process is successful, false if not
See Also:
ZipArchiveOutputStream, ZipArchiveEntry

compressGzip

                                        java.lang.String destArchiveStr)
                                 throws org.apache.commons.compress.compressors.CompressorException,
                                        java.io.IOException
Handle Gzip. Gzip is usually for tar compress file, and related method is called internally in compressTarGz method.

Parameters:
targetArchiveOrFile - target archive of file
destArchiveStr - destination archive
Returns:
related file
Throws:
org.apache.commons.compress.compressors.CompressorException

compressTarGz

Handle tar.gz by getting compress file path of directory or file as parameter.

Parameters:
targetDir - target directory
Returns:
true if compress process is successful, false if not

compressTarGz

public static boolean compressTarGz(java.lang.String targetDir,
                                    java.lang.String destTarGzStr)
Get compress destination path for directory or file as parameter to handle tar.gz. In this case, create compressed file in destTarGzStr path returned as parameter. Internally, the Tar file created after compressing compressTar is compressed in Gzip by calling compressGzip method. Note that tar file is created in the same location as final tar.gz compress file.

Parameters:
targetDir - target directory
destTarGzStr - destination tar gz
Returns:
true if compress process is successful, false if not

Parameters:
targetDir - target directory
Returns:
true if compress process is successful, false if not

compressAr

public static boolean compressAr(java.lang.String targetDir,
                                 java.lang.String destArchiveStr)
Handle Ar by getting compress destination path for directory or file as parameter. In this case, create compressed file in destArchiveStr path returned as parameter. Note that there is a 16 byte limit to filename.

Parameters:
targetDir - target directory
destArchiveStr - destination archive
Returns:
true if compress process is successful, false if not
See Also:
ArArchiveOutputStream, ArchiveEntry
